title: Barbarian Reyvateil Companion Quiz
introduction: As the storm clouds gather and the fires of determination burn within you...

questions.question: The Tower of Chaos presents you with a crossroads: a tumultuous stormy path or a scorched, fiery trail. You:

options.A: Embrace the storm, letting its energy fuel your resolve and drive you forward.
options.B: Forge ahead through the fire, harnessing its heat to empower your strikes.
options.C: Assess both paths carefully, seeking a balance between storm and fire to navigate effectively.

questions.question: During a fierce battle, you notice your strength waning as your rage builds. You:

options.A: Channel your inner tempest, allowing the storm within to sustain your fury and resilience.
options.B: Ignite your passion like molten lava, using the heat of your rage to fuel powerful attacks.
options.C: Ground yourself, finding stability amidst chaos to maintain control over your rage.

questions.question: A mystical artifact in the Tower offers a choice: a lightning-infused weapon, a stone-carved shield, or a flame-forged amulet. You:

options.A: Choose the lightning-infused weapon, drawn to its electrifying power and ability to intimidate foes.
options.B: Select the stone-carved shield, valuing its steadfast protection and grounding presence.
options.C: Opt for the flame-forged amulet, intrigued by its ability to enhance your fiery prowess.

questions.question: A fellow Diver is conflicted between succumbing to overwhelming anger or maintaining composure for the group's sake. You:

options.A: Encourage them to unleash their fury, believing that strength through rage is essential for survival.
options.B: Advise them to remain steadfast and grounded, emphasizing resilience and endurance.
options.C: Help them find a balance, using their anger constructively while supporting the group's harmony.

questions.question: The Reyvateil presents you with a choice during a ritual: invoke a storm to intimidate enemies, summon earth to stabilize the surroundings, or ignite flames to disorient adversaries. You:

options.A: Invoke the storm, letting its fierce power demonstrate your might and control.
options.B: Summon the earth, using its solidity to protect and fortify your allies.
options.C: Ignite the flames, creating chaos and confusion to gain the upper hand in battle.

reyvateilMapping.description: Thundara's storm-infused wings and ability to amplify rage align perfectly with your affinity for harnessing the raw energy of the tempest...
Gronk's earth-etched form and strength-enhancing abilities resonate with your grounded and resilient nature...
Ragnor's fiery essence and ability to unleash blazing strikes mirror your passion and determination in battle...
